alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 1:31AM CDT until September 19 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HANCOCK...SOUTH CENTRAL LEE AND EAST CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 130 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Keokuk, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Elvaston around 140 AM CDT. Sutter around 145 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Basco and Bentley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
